verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3947>raise<s%> a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> for Me; from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5068>moves<s%> him you shall <S%H3947>raise<s%> My <S%H8641>contribution.<s%>
"And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are to <S%H3947>raise<s%> from them: <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze,<s%>
<S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> [hair,]
rams' <S%H5785>skins<s%> <S%H119>dyed<s%> <S%H119>red,<s%> <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
<S%H8081>oil<s%> for <S%H3974>lighting,<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and for the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
<S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H4394>setting<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and for the <S%H2833>breastpiece.<s%>
"And let them <S%H6213>construct<s%> a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for Me, that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

"According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I am going to <S%H7200>show<s%> you, [as] the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furniture,<s%> just <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H6213>construct<s%> [it.]

"And they shall <S%H6213>construct<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and out you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it, and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it.

"And you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it, and <S%H5414>fasten<s%> them on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it.
"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with them.
"The <S%H905>poles<s%> shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> in the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H727>ark;<s%> they shall not be <S%H5493>removed<s%> from it.
"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you.

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> them of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

"And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H7098>end<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7098>end;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> [of one piece] with the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> at its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends.<s%>

"And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> [their] <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H5526>covering<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H6440>facing<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another;<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> are to be [turned] <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> on <S%H4605>top<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and in the <S%H727>ark<s%> you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to you.

"And <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you; and from <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat,<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are upon the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you about <S%H3605>all<s%> that I will <S%H6680>give<s%> you in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and one <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H7341>wide<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>border<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it.

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for it a <S%H4526>rim<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> [it;] and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>border<s%> for the <S%H4526>rim<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it.

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
"The <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be <S%H5980>close<s%> to the <S%H4526>rim<s%> as <S%H1004>holders<s%> for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> so that with them the <S%H7979>table<s%> may be <S%H5375>carried.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H7086>dishes<s%> and its <S%H3709>pans<s%> and its <S%H7184>jars<s%> and its <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> to <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H5258>libations;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6440>Presence<s%> on the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me at <S%H8548>all<s%> <S%H8548>times.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> The <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> [and] its <S%H3409>base<s%> and its <S%H7070>shaft<s%> are to be <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work;<s%> its <S%H1375>cups,<s%> its <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers<s%> shall be [of one piece] with it.

"And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out from its <S%H6654>sides;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> from its <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> from its <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side.<s%>

<S%H7969>"Three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> [shall be] <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms] in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms] in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%> â€“ <S%H3651>so<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out from the <S%H4501>lampstand;<s%>
and in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms,] its <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers.<s%>

"And a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> shall be <S%H8478>under<s%> the [first] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>[coming<s%>] out of it, and a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the [second] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> [coming] out of it, and a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the [third] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> [coming] out of it, for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> coming out of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>

"Their <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> [shall be of <S%H259>one<s%> piece] with it; <S%H3605>all<s%> of it shall be one piece of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> [in number;] and they shall <S%H5927>mount<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> so as to <S%H215>shed<s%> <S%H215>light<s%> on the <S%H5676>space<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of it.
"And its <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> and their <S%H4289>trays<s%> [shall be] of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"It shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> from a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3627>utensils.<s%>
"And <S%H7200>see<s%> that you <S%H6213>make<s%> [them] after the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> for them, <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H7200>shown<s%> to you on the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
